title: It is prohibited to call a Muslim a kafir but can we assume someone is a kafir based on their name?
transcript: uh faizan from india he says in my country the majority of the people are kafir so can i judge a person by his name the answer is yes the default is that he's a kafir until proven otherwise unlike if you come to saudi arabia the defaulties whom you see are muslims until proven otherwise so if you see someone and in india and his name is something that only the sikh or the hindus are called by yes you have all the right to assume that he is a kafir
